name: Burst Scan
description:
Before either side chooses their action: If your side has Dendro Core or Bountiful Core, -1 to their Usage(s), and Discard the card at the top of your deck. After this, deal Dendro DMG equal to the original Elemental Dice Cost of the card you Discarded.
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack. Max 3 stacks)
